name: Sarah Johnson
title: Chief Executive Officer
bio: Sarah has over 20 years of experience in logistics and supply chain management. Before founding Purple Pocket LLC, she served as Regional Director for USPS operations in the Western United States.

name: Michael Rodriguez
title: Chief Operations Officer
bio: Michael brings 15 years of experience in transportation logistics. He previously managed a fleet of over 200 vehicles and specializes in optimizing delivery routes for maximum efficiency.

name: Jennifer Lee
title: Chief Financial Officer
bio: Jennifer is a CPA with 18 years of experience in financial management. She oversees all financial operations and has helped Purple Pocket achieve consistent growth since joining in 2017.
